eflow.foundation.data_pipeline¶

Classes

DataPipeline(pipeline_name, df[, …])

Houses all pipeline segments.
class DataPipeline(pipeline_name, df, df_features=None, pipeline_modify_id=None, remove_past_contents=False)[source]¶

Houses all pipeline segments. Able to load these segments in with a pipeline json file and/or modify id. You can add more pipeline segments if needed which will modify the pipeline’s json file. Allows a pandas dataframe to be processed by ‘perform_pipeline’.

add(segment_name, pipeline_segment_obj)[source]¶
segment_name (str):

A aliased name to refer to this segment.

pipeline_segment_obj (child of DataPipelineSegment):

A child object of type DataPipelineSegment.

Returns:

Attempts to add a pipeline segment object to the objects que and update it’s related json object.

property file_name¶
Returns:

File name with extension.

property file_path¶
Returns:

File path with file name.

perform_pipeline(df, df_features=None)[source]¶
Args:
df:

Pandas Dataframe object to be transformed by the pipeline.

Returns:

Applies a Pandas Dataframe object to all functions on all segments in the pipeline.
